name: Morticus's Laboratory: The Escape of the Chicken
name_original: Morticus's Laboratory: The Escape of the Chicken
description: Morticus's Laboratory : The Escape of the Chicken is a 2D platformer where you play as a chicken who must escape the laboratory of the evil Professor Morticus and stop him from doing any more animal experiments. You will have to cross fifteen rooms full of traps in order to do so.
